title: Covid-19: Dark-Kitchen Business will be the next Big Trend
description: Cloud kitchens, also popularly referred to as dark kitchens, ghost kitchens, virtual restaurants, or restaurant-as-a-service (RAAS), are kitchens, which focus exclusively on takeaways. These kitchens work on a hub-&-spoke model – where ‘hub’ refers to the kitchen where food is produced and ‘spoke’ refers to the delivery partner that makes sure the food reaches in time to the customers.
